unifiedStories.hed: Thanks for making 2019¬†our best year yet!
unifiedStories.summary:
Every new year comes with hopeful¬†optimism ‚Äî a fresh start, a series¬†of resolutions, and here at Glitch, the promise¬†of more creativity to discover and unlock.

We can't wait to code and create more together in 2020, but first, let's acknowledge all the ways the Glitch community made 2019 stellar.¬†

Here's a quick look at last year's highlights.

relatedContent.title: Learn About Our Open Board Member Search

featureCallouts.label: Spark your next project
featureCallouts.description: Use more than a million free web apps instantly, or remix to make them your own. Find handy tools for work, art experiments, big ideas for education, and more.

featureCallouts.label: Just start typing
featureCallouts.description: No more fussing with servers and setup: Your app is live on the web as you type. Create industry-standard code (with no lock-in), whether you‚Äôre a new coder or an expert.

featureCallouts.label: Code together
featureCallouts.description: Work seamlessly with your friends or coworkers on any project, and connect to the dev tools you already use. Code something new together, or customize existing Glitch apps.

buildingOnGlitch.title: Developers + Coders
buildingOnGlitch.description: Whether you‚Äôre learning how to code or building a production-level app, find out how Glitch can power your next idea.

buildingOnGlitch.title: Teams
buildingOnGlitch.description: Collaborate on apps with your teammates, build starter apps for your next hackathon, or use Glitch to teach others how to create with code.
